name: k2hr3-api
description: K2HR3 REST API is K2hdkc based Resource and Roles and policy Rules

scripts.help:
echo 'command list:
    npm run start
    npm run start:prod
    npm run start:production
    npm run start:dev
    npm run start:develop
    npm run start:dbg
    npm run start:debug
    npm run start:debug:break
    npm run start:debug:nobreak
    npm run start:watcher:prod
    npm run start:watcher:production
    npm run start:watcher:dev
    npm run start:watcher:develop
    npm run start:watcher:dbg
    npm run start:watcher:debug
    npm run start:watcher:debug:break
    npm run start:watcher:debug:nobreak
    npm run start:watcher:oneshot:prod
    npm run start:watcher:oneshot:production
    npm run start:watcher:oneshot:dev
    npm run start:watcher:oneshot:develop
    npm run start:watcher:oneshot:dbg
    npm run start:watcher:oneshot:debug
    npm run start:watcher:oneshot:debug:break
    npm run start:watcher:oneshot:debug:nobreak
    npm run stop
    npm run stop:watcher
    npm run test
    npm run test:lint
    npm run test:cover
    npm run test:auto:all{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:version{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:usertokens{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:list{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:resource{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:policy{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:role{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:service{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:acr{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:userdata{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:extdata{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:watcher{:dbg}
    npm run test:auto:templengine
    npm run test:auto:templengine:async
    npm run test:manual:apis:version_get
    npm run test:manual:apis:usertoken_postput
    npm run test:manual:apis:usertoken_gethead
    npm run test:manual:apis:policy_postput
    npm run test:manual:apis:policy_gethead
    npm run test:manual:apis:policy_delete
    npm run test:manual:apis:resource_postput
    npm run test:manual:apis:resource_gethead
    npm run test:manual:apis:resource_delete
    npm run test:manual:apis:role_postput
    npm run test:manual:apis:role_gethead
    npm run test:manual:apis:role_delete
    npm run test:manual:apis:service_postput
    npm run test:manual:apis:service_gethead
    npm run test:manual:apis:service_delete
    npm run test:manual:apis:acr_postput
    npm run test:manual:apis:acr_get
    npm run test:manual:apis:acr_delete
    npm run test:manual:apis:list_gethead
    npm run test:manual:apis:userdata_get
    npm run test:manual:apis:extdata_get
    npm run test:manual:apis:allusertenant_get
    npm run test:manual:apis:k2hr3keys_get
    npm run test:manual:load:k2hdkcdata:auto
    npm run test:manual:load:k2hdkcdata:local
    npm run test:manual:templengine
    npm run test:manual:templengine:async
'
scripts.start:production: bin/run.sh -bg --production && echo '' && echo 'Start on production - Success' && echo ''
scripts.start:develop: echo '' && echo 'Start on development without debugging' && echo '' && bin/run.sh -bg --development
scripts.start:debug:break: echo '' && echo 'Start on development with debugging' && echo '' && bin/run.sh --development --debug --debuglevel dbg
scripts.start:debug:nobreak: echo '' && echo 'Start on development with debugging no break' && echo '' && bin/run.sh --development --debug-nobrk --debuglevel dbg
scripts.start:watcher:production: bin/run.sh -bg --production --watcher && echo '' && echo 'Start watcher on production - Success' && echo ''
scripts.start:watcher:develop: echo '' && echo 'Start watcher on development without debugging' && echo '' && bin/run.sh -bg --development --watcher
scripts.start:watcher:debug:break: echo '' && echo 'Start watcher on development with debugging' && echo '' && bin/run.sh --development --watcher --debug --debuglevel dbg
scripts.start:watcher:debug:nobreak: echo '' && echo 'Start watcher on development with debugging no break' && echo '' && bin/run.sh --development --watcher --debug-nobrk --debuglevel dbg
scripts.start:watcher:oneshot:production: bin/run.sh -bg --production --watcher --oneshot && echo '' && echo 'Start watcher on production - Success' && echo ''
scripts.start:watcher:oneshot:develop: echo '' && echo 'Start watcher on development without debugging' && echo '' && bin/run.sh -bg --development --watcher --oneshot
scripts.start:watcher:oneshot:debug:break: echo '' && echo 'Start watcher on development with debugging' && echo '' && bin/run.sh --development --watcher --oneshot --debug --debuglevel dbg
scripts.start:watcher:oneshot:debug:nobreak: echo '' && echo 'Start watcher on development with debugging no break' && echo '' && bin/run.sh --development --watcher --oneshot --debug-nobrk --debuglevel dbg
scripts.stop:watcher: bin/run.sh -stop --watcher && echo '' && echo 'Stop watcher - Success' && echo ''
scripts.test:lint: eslint lib/*.js app.js bin/www bin/watcher routes/*.js tests/*.js
scripts.test:cover: echo 'Test with coverage' && nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text npm run test:auto:all
scripts.test:auto:all: echo 'All test' && npm run test:lint && tests/test.sh -t 8000 all && npm run test:auto:templengine && npm run test:auto:templengine:async && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:all:dbg: echo 'All test with debugging' && npm run test:lint && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg all && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:version: echo 'Test Version' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 version && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:version:dbg: echo 'Test Version with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg version && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:usertokens: echo 'Test UserTokens' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 usertokens && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:usertokens:dbg: echo 'Test UserTokens with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg usertokens && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:list: echo 'Test List' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 list && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:list:dbg: echo 'Test List with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg list && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:resource: echo 'Test Resource' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 resource && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:resource:dbg: echo 'Test Resource with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg resource && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:policy: echo 'Test Policy' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 policy && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:policy:dbg: echo 'Test Policy with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg policy && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:role: echo 'Test Role' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 role && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:role:dbg: echo 'Test Role with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg role && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:service: echo 'Test Service' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 service && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:service:dbg: echo 'Test Service with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg service && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:acr: echo 'Test ACR' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 acr && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:acr:dbg: echo 'Test ACR with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg acr && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:userdata: echo 'Test Userdata' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 userdata && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:userdata:dbg: echo 'Test Userdata with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg userdata && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:extdata: echo 'Test Extdata' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 extdata && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:extdata:dbg: echo 'Test Extdata with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg extdata && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:watcher: echo 'Test Watcher Process' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 watcher && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:watcher:dbg: echo 'Test Watcher Process with debugging' && tests/test.sh -t 8000 -d dbg watcher && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:templengine: echo 'Test template engine' && tests/auto_template.sh && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:auto:templengine:async: echo 'Test asynchronous template engine' && tests/auto_template.sh -a && echo 'Succeed test' && echo ''
scripts.test:manual:
echo 'Manual test : npm run test:manual:*
      test:manual:apis:version_get
      test:manual:apis:usertoken_postput
      test:manual:apis:usertoken_gethead
      test:manual:apis:policy_postput
      test:manual:apis:policy_gethead
      test:manual:apis:policy_delete
      test:manual:apis:resource_postput
      test:manual:apis:resource_gethead
      test:manual:apis:resource_delete
      test:manual:apis:role_postput
      test:manual:apis:role_gethead
      test:manual:apis:role_delete
      test:manual:apis:service_postput
      test:manual:apis:service_gethead
      test:manual:apis:service_delete
      test:manual:apis:acr_postput
      test:manual:apis:acr_get
      test:manual:apis:acr_delete
      test:manual:apis:list_gethead
      test:manual:apis:userdata_get
      test:manual:apis:extdata_get
      test:manual:apis:allusertenant_get
      test:manual:apis:k2hr3keys_get
      test:manual:load:k2hdkcdata:auto
      test:manual:load:k2hdkcdata:local
      test:manual:templengine
      test:manual:templengine:async
'
scripts.test:manual:load:k2hdkcdata:auto: tests/k2hdkc_test_load.sh  --for_auto_test && echo '' && echo 'Load test data for automatically testing - Success' && echo ''
scripts.test:manual:load:k2hdkcdata:local: tests/k2hdkc_test_load.sh --main 33348 --sub 37146 && echo '' && echo 'Load test data for local testing - Success' && echo ''
scripts.test:manual:templengine: tests/auto_template.sh && echo '' && echo 'Test template engine - Success' && echo ''
scripts.test:manual:templengine:async: tests/auto_template.sh -a && echo '' && echo 'Test asynchronous template engine - Success' && echo ''

author: Takeshi Nakatani <ggtakec@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ggtakec)
